title: Best of the Program | Guest: Susan Crockford | 11/5/19
description:
Nine Americans were brutally killed in Mexico by the cartel. All were women and children, as young as six months old! We need to recognize the danger on our border and stop playing politics! There has been a battle in this country since its settling between the liberty of Plymouth and the slavery of Jamestown. We MUST choose which defines us.  And Ilhan Omar is still spreading debunked Trump lies. In light of election season, Glenn and Pat review some of the weirdest ballot initiatives ever. Zoologist and polar bear expert Susan Crockford joins the program after she was refused a renewal to her adjunct faculty position for “unbalanced” lectures that prove there is NO polar bear catastrophe.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
